cnbc.title: Wall Street is upbeat on tech megacaps, but big questions loom on AI spending, China, Trump tariffs
cnbc.summary: Tech earnings season kicks off on Wednesday after market close with results from Alphabet and Tesla.

cnbc.title: AI startups raised $104 billion in first half of year, but exits tell a different story
cnbc.summary: AI accounted for nearly two-thirds of all fundraising deal value in the first half of 2025, with the bulk of those dollars concentrated in a few companies.

cnbc.title: White House releases U.S.-Indonesia trade deal framework, final talks underway
cnbc.summary: The newly announced 19% tariff on Indonesian goods is lower than the 32% rate it had faced under President Donald Trump's previous "liberation day" plans.

cnbc.title: Microsoft poaches more Google DeepMind AI talent as it beefs up Copilot
cnbc.summary: Microsoft's artificial intelligence group has been growing under Mustafa Suleyman, a co-founder of the DeepMind research lab Google acquired years ago.

cnbc.title: Trump met with Amazon's Jeff Bezos at the White House last week, sources say
cnbc.summary: A Gulfstream G700 private jet linked to Bezos landed in Dulles, Virginia, outside Washington, on July 14 before taking off the next day.

cnbc.title: Amazon to buy AI company Bee that makes wearable listening device
cnbc.summary: Amazon has launched a flurry of AI products and services, and it recently overhauled its Alexa voice assistant with the technology.

cnbc.title: Trump says U.S. struck trade, military deal with the Philippines; Manila has not confirmed
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump said the U.S. has "concluded" a trade deal with the Philippines that includes a 19% tariff on goods from the southeast Asian country.

cnbc.title: New Jersey man pleads guilty to leading $600 million catalytic converter theft ring
cnbc.summary: The Covid pandemic saw an explosion in thefts of catalytic converters, which contain precious metals, including platinum, palladium and rhodium.

cnbc.title: Texas Instruments' stock falls on weak forecast
cnbc.summary: Texas Instruments forecast third-quarter revenue that missed analysts' estimates.

cnbc.title: Sen. Mike Lee posts, deletes fake Fed Chair Powell resignation letter: Reports
cnbc.summary: The letter surfaced as President Donald Trump has bludgeoned the Federal Reserve chairman with criticism over his refusal to cut interest rates.
